Description:
An Idyllic Retreat Within A Prized Pocket
Flaunting a tranquil splendour, this secluded family retreat, set upon an elevated garden allotment of 858sqm (approx.) on the cusp of the prestigious 'Tintern' estate is undoubtedly a remarkable find designed with family pleasure in mind.
The inviting residence continues to impress throughout the fastidiously presented interiors ideally set out over three split-levels and affording a flexible functionality. Comprising an elegant formal lounge with plush quality carpet adding a luxury feel, and an adjoining, enclosed sunroom provides a most peaceful escape to enjoy the views with your morning cuppa.
A spacious formal dining, with bespoke 'buffet', could easily be utilised as a fourth bedroom or further living space, and the modern kitchen, well appointed with a breakfast bar, double pantry and De Longhi dishwasher, extends into the meals area and family zone.
This central family hub accesses both the sideway and covered patio abounded by lush greenery creating a tranquil feel, while the rear gardens are a delightful discovery with brick paved pathways meandering between grassy areas for children to play, and dotted with 'secret' sitting spots for serene relaxation.

The elevated master bedroom is complemented with abundant robing, air-conditioned comfort and a full ensuite; positioned well away from the further two double bedrooms fitted with full height robing and sharing the newly refreshed family bathroom with a separate shower and bathtub, plus separate toilet.
Notable benefits also include gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, ceiling fans, high ceilings with ornate roses, a separate laundry with pet door and double troughs plus plentiful driveway parking and a double carport.
Situated a short walk to Tintern Grammar, kinder and childcare, Eastwood and Tinternvale Primary's, playgrounds and reserves with easy proximity to Ringwood Secondary and Aquinas Colleges, Jubilee Park and Aquanation, medical services, Croydon amenities, EastLink access and Eastland Shopping Centre. Presented in an exemplary manner, this impeccable and most enjoyable abode deserves your full attention.

Description:
Sophisticated and Modern Suburban Living
Occupying a fantastic corner block in a family friendly neighbourhood, this extensively renovated cottage style home is exceptionally pleasing to the eye.
Sleek, modern and brought well into the 21st century, this beautifully brick rendered residence looks more like it should be on the cover of a magazine than in its superb suburban location.
A Fully landscaped front garden and clever crossover driveway as you enter the property sets the tone for what is an all-round impeccably presented dwelling on 516sqm (approx).
Polished floorboards throughout give this home an open and relaxed feel as you enter into the welcoming living and dining space. Featuring a gas log heater, wall tv inset and plenty of light from the north facing windows this is a spectacular space to spend some time.
Connecting seamlessly with the living and dining area is the updated kitchen, featuring a floating bench, glass splashback, stainless steel gas cook top, oven, dishwasher and rangehood. Brilliantly placed, a servery window and glass doors to the outside deck make indoor/outdoor living a breeze.
Outside the magnificent deck and undercover alfresco, including completely covered two tiered sittings areas, connection for a wall mounted tv and to the kitchen servery, entertaining here will be a pleasure.
Back inside, three good-sized bedrooms - two with ceiling fans, built-in robes, provide plenty of accommodation options. Sleek materials enhance the clean, contemporary lines of the master bathroom which includes a separate shower and bath and fashionable light fittings.
This home is packed full of extras including new window furnishings, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, LED lighting, sensor lights in the hallway, toilet and pantry, alarm system, security cameras, modern light fittings, upgraded switchboard, power supply for an outdoor spa, internet and foxtel connectivity.
Perhaps most importantly, the home is also connected to mains fed 2.2KW solar power with which its new owners will be able to take advantage of the current government tariff of a minimum 6.2 cents per kilowatt hour for excess electricity fed back into the grid - an added bonus when it comes to paying the power bill.
Renovated to great effect and presented in the modern-day, this charming package really has it all. In a location close to Ringwood East and Croydon shopping, the re-developing Eastland Shopping Precinct, local transport and restaurants and within walking distance to arguably the area's best education facilities in Tintern and Tinternvale this property is sure to attract wide appeal.
- Fully renovated cottage style home
- Fantastic covered alfresco entertaining area
- Central kitchen with floating bench and servery
- Modern bathroom with classic finishes
- Landscaped garden with dual crossover driveway
- Easy access to Tintern and local shopping

Description:
'Wirringa' - A Home of Unimaginable Grace & Serenity
Sale by Set Date 29/10/2015
Beautifully poised upon well over a third-of-an-acre of flowering botanical gardens, this circa-1901 residence portrays an enchanting ambience reminiscent of yesteryear, while indulging delightfully in today's modern comforts and luxuries to deliver an utterly spectacular abode certain to capture your heart at first glance.
A long winding driveway leads romantically up to 'Wirringa', a stately residence elevated imposingly on the high side of its private court setting to delight the homes residents with a visual feast of the spectacular and panoramic vista of the Dandenong Ranges. The impeccable weatherboard facade has been newly refreshed in its original tones of white-and-dark green, exhibiting a shady and inviting upper balcony (perfect to sit, relax and enjoy the tranquillity and views), gabled rooflines and a manicured rose arbour on the verge of bursting into bloom at the front of the home; all combining to create an air of elegance and welcome.
Designed on a grand scale, the expansive, split-level layout comprises a gorgeous and substantial formal lounge cosily enhanced with a gas log fireplace; a light-filled formal dining room boasting a floating Oriel window, and a spacious family zone with large windows and timber multi-lit doors providing both a glorious outlook and access out to your own secluded retreat - a peaceful haven made perfect by the sunny patio, sparkling solar-heated salt-water pool and spa, and the well-established professionally landscaped gardens showcasing a stunning waterfall cascading into the pool.
Also located on this upper level is a bespoke study fitted with beautiful timber bookcases, and a quintessential English farmhouse-style kitchen and meals space enviably appointed with marble surfaces, a quaint pot rack, loads of cabinetry including a double pantry, plumbing for an ice-making refrigerator, an LG stainless-steel dishwasher and a fabulous freestanding Smeg 900mm dual-fuel cooker.
The bedroom accommodation is both large and luxurious, including the master suite further boasting a fitted walk-in robe, classic full ensuite and entry to front verandah; and a family-sized, ideally segregated bathroom with corner bath, separate oversized shower, glossy porcelain tiling, dual vanity's and a powder room conveniently accessed from pool area.
Head downstairs to find yet another living space with the sizeable, externally accessed rumpus (ideal for those who run businesses from home) enjoying comfortable carpet and a 'secret' doorway to walk-in storage; along with a further two amply-robed bedrooms.
A host of period detailing features elaborate leadlighting, sky-high panelled ceilings, picture rails and half-timbered walls, decorative corbels to archways, embossed wallpapering, sash windows and a total of three working open fireplaces plus the gas fireplace all with traditional timber mantelpieces.
Modern appointments also include gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, security system, separate laundry, safety locks to all pool-accessing doors, a plethora of storage inside and underneath the home plus a double carport with side workshop lockable via roller-doors. The house has also been re-stumped; and zoned areas of the garden are ideal for family enjoyment with private sitting spots and level grassy areas for children to play, a covered alfresco with mains-gas connection for BBQ, plus citrus trees and veggie patch.
Prestigiously located in the Tintern pocket and only a short stroll to Eastfield Shopping Centre, Cheong and Eastfield Parks, Tinternvale Primary, Tintern Grammar and Ringwood East Shopping Strip with cafes and rail transport. Also within easy reach of Aquanation, Aquinas, Eastland Shopping Centre and EastLink, this is indeed a unique offering for those who love a home infused with character and atmosphere. Call to arrange your inspection today!
